title: Elven arrow/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Elven_arrow "Elven arrow")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| ) [![Elven arrow.png](/images/4/4a/Elven_arrow.png)](/wiki/File:Elven_arrow.png) |                                                                                              |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 名称                                                                               | 精灵箭                                                                                          |
| 外观                                                                               | 符文箭                                                                                          |
| 伤害（小型）                                                                           | 1d7                                                                                          |
| 伤害（大型）                                                                           | 1d6                                                                                          |
| 命中修正                                                                             | +0                                                                                           |
| 武器技能类别                                                                           | [弓](/wiki/%E5%BC%93 "弓")                                                                     |
| 规格                                                                               | [单手](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%95%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "单手 (page does not exist)") |
| 基础价                                                                              | 2 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN") （+10/正数附魔等级）                                               |
| 重量                                                                               | [1](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")  |
| 材料                                                                               | [木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)") |

**精灵箭**（elven arrow）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[发射物](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E7%89%A9 "发射物")类[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它是专用于[弓](/wiki/%E5%BC%93 "弓")类武器的发射物，由[木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)")制成，且未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**符文箭**（runed arrow）。

精灵族的[怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")或[角色](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")使用[精灵弓](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E5%BC%93 "精灵弓")发射精灵箭时会获得+1[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")和+1伤害加成[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [3 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [4.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [4.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [4.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [4.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [5 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

精灵族的[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一堆+0精灵箭和一堆+2精灵箭[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

非亡灵的精灵族怪物生成时有1⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")3～14支精灵箭[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 策略

精灵箭的伤害比普通箭略强些，除非你需要使用种族武器来最大化多重射击加成，否则精灵箭一般是更优的选择。由于精灵箭由木头制成，它免疫生锈和腐蚀类的[侵蚀损伤](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80%E6%8D%9F%E4%BC%A4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀损伤 (page does not exist)")，不过，在对付具有火属性[被动攻击](/index.php?title=%E8%A2%AB%E5%8A%A8%E6%94%BB%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "被动攻击 (page does not exist)")的怪物（如[火元素](/index.php?title=%E7%81%AB%E5%85%83%E7%B4%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "火元素 (page does not exist)")），或是能够食用有机材料的怪物（如[黏胶立方怪](/index.php?title=%E9%BB%8F%E8%83%B6%E7%AB%8B%E6%96%B9%E6%80%AA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "黏胶立方怪 (page does not exist)")）时，应当换用其他的弹药。

## 历史

精灵箭最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_arrow/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") elven arrows will produce standard arrows, and upgrading standard arrows has a 1⁄3 chance of producing elven arrows.

Shooting non-cursed elven arrows from any bow has a 1⁄3 chance of an additional +1 multishot bonus.[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the second alternate layout of the [Castle](/wiki/Castle_\(UnNetHack\) "Castle (UnNetHack)") has a chance of generating blessed and enchanted elven arrows in the [barracks](/wiki/Barracks "Barracks") overlooking the [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge "Drawbridge").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), elven arrows deal 1d7 damage to small monsters and 1d5 damage to large monsters, with a +2 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), elven Rangers that [invoke](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") [The Longbow of Diana](/wiki/The_Longbow_of_Diana "The Longbow of Diana") will generate elven arrows instead of standard ones.

Elven arrows can be used at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") to create a couple of items:

- 2 elven arrows can be combined with a [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife") to create an [elven dagger](/wiki/Elven_dagger "Elven dagger").
- 2 elven arrows can be combined with an elven dagger to create an [elven spear](/wiki/Elven_spear "Elven spear").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading standard arrows will produce elven arrows, and upgrading elven arrows will produce [orcish arrows](/wiki/Orcish_arrow "Orcish arrow").

In addition to EvilHack forge recipes, 2 [darts](/wiki/Dart "Dart") can be combined with 2 elven arrows to create a knife.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 167](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dothrow.c#L167): *多重射击加成*
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/uhitm.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 848](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/uhitm.c#L848): *伤害加成*
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 208](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L208)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 222](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L222)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [dothrow.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 175](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/dothrow.c#line175 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/dothrow.c")

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Elven arrow/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Elven arrow
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
)
名称 精灵箭
外观 符文箭
伤害（小型） 1d7
伤害（大型） 1d6
命中修正 +0
武器技能类别 弓
规格 单手
基础价 2 zm
（+10/正数附魔等级）
重量 1
材料 木头

精灵箭（elven arrow）是NetHack中的一种发射物类武器。它是专用于弓类武器的发射物，由木头制成，且未鉴定时外观为符文箭（runed arrow）。

精灵族的怪物或角色使用精灵弓发射精灵箭时会获得+1多重射击和+1伤害加成[1][2]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 策略
  • 3 历史
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 SLASH'EM
    • 4.2 UnNetHack
    • 4.3 dNetHack
    • 4.4 EvilHack
    • 4.5 Hack'EM
  • 5 引用及注释

生成

精灵族的游侠在游戏开始时会获得一堆+0精灵箭和一堆+2精灵箭[3]。

非亡灵的精灵族怪物生成时有1⁄3的概率携带3～14支精灵箭[4]。

策略

精灵箭的伤害比普通箭略强些，除非你需要使用种族武器来最大化多重射击加成，否则精灵箭一般是更优的选择。由于精灵箭由木头制成，它免疫生锈和腐蚀类的侵蚀损伤，不过，在对付具有火属性被动攻击的怪物（如火元素），或是能够食用有机材料的怪物（如黏胶立方怪）时，应当换用其他的弹药。

历史

精灵箭最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading elven arrows will produce standard arrows, and upgrading standard arrows has a 1⁄3 chance of producing elven arrows.

Shooting non-cursed elven arrows from any bow has a 1⁄3 chance of an additional +1 multishot bonus.[5]

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the second alternate layout of the Castle has a chance of generating blessed and enchanted elven arrows in the barracks overlooking the drawbridge.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, elven arrows deal 1d7 damage to small monsters and 1d5 damage to large monsters, with a +2 to-hit bonus.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, elven Rangers that invoke The Longbow of Diana will generate elven arrows instead of standard ones.

Elven arrows can be used at a forge to create a couple of items:

  • 2 elven arrows can be combined with a knife to create an elven dagger.
  • 2 elven arrows can be combined with an elven dagger to create an elven spear.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, upgrading standard arrows will produce elven arrows, and upgrading elven arrows will produce orcish arrows.

In addition to EvilHack forge recipes, 2 darts can be combined with 2 elven arrows to create a knife.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 167: 多重射击加成
  2. ↑ src/uhitm.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 848: 伤害加成
  3. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 208
  4. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 222
  5. ↑ dothrow.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 175

'''精灵箭'''（elven arrow）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[发射物]]类[[武器]]。它是专用于[[弓]]类武器的发射物，由[[木头]]制成，且未[[鉴定]]时外观为'''符文箭'''（runed arrow）。

精灵族的[[精灵（怪物属性）|怪物]]或[[精灵（起始种族）|角色]]使用[[精灵弓]]发射精灵箭时会获得+1[[多重射击]]和+1伤害加成{{refsrc|src/dothrow.c|167|nethack=3.6.7|comment=多重射击加成}}{{refsrc|src/uhitm.c|848|nethack=3.6.7|comment=伤害加成}}。

== 生成 ==
精灵族的[[游侠]]在游戏开始时会获得一堆+0精灵箭和一堆+2精灵箭{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|208|nethack=3.6.7}}。

非亡灵的精灵族怪物生成时有{{frac|3}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]{{rn1|12|3|{{波浪线}}}}支精灵箭{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|222|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
精灵箭的伤害比普通箭略强些，除非你需要使用种族武器来最大化多重射击加成，否则精灵箭一般是更优的选择。由于精灵箭由木头制成，它免疫生锈和腐蚀类的[[侵蚀损伤]]，不过，在对付具有火属性[[被动攻击]]的怪物（如[[火元素]]），或是能够食用有机材料的怪物（如[[黏胶立方怪]]）时，应当换用其他的弹药。

== 历史 ==
精灵箭最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] elven arrows will produce standard arrows, and upgrading standard arrows has a {{frac|3}} chance of producing elven arrows.

Shooting non-cursed elven arrows from any bow has a {{frac|3}} chance of an additional +1 multishot bonus.{{refsrc|dothrow.c|175|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the second alternate layout of the [[Castle (UnNetHack)|Castle]] has a chance of generating blessed and enchanted elven arrows in the [[barracks]] overlooking the [[drawbridge]].

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], elven arrows deal 1d7 damage to small monsters and 1d5 damage to large monsters, with a +2 [[to-hit]] bonus.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], elven Rangers that [[invoke]] [[The Longbow of Diana]] will generate elven arrows instead of standard ones.

Elven arrows can be used at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] to create a couple of items:

* 2 elven arrows can be combined with a [[knife]] to create an [[elven dagger]].
* 2 elven arrows can be combined with an elven dagger to create an [[elven spear]].

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], upgrading standard arrows will produce elven arrows, and upgrading elven arrows will produce [[orcish arrow]]s.

In addition to EvilHack forge recipes, 2 [[dart]]s can be combined with 2 elven arrows to create a knife.
